mapper.insert: insert into ac_charge (id, tenant_id, product_id, money, quota, expired_time, note, status, charge_manager, charge_time) values(#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{productId}, #{money}, #{quota}, #{expiredTime}, #{note}, 1, #{chargeManager}, now())
mapper.update: update ac_charge set status=#{status}, editor=#{editor}, edit_time=now() where id=#{id}
